<result>
# CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.

## Build Commands

- `bun dev` - Start development server (localhost:3000)
- `bun build` - Build for production
- `bun lint` - Run ESLint
- `bun lint:fix` - Auto-fix ESLint issues

## Architecture

This is a Next.js 15 portfolio site using App Router with React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS 4.x, and MDX for blog posts.

### Directory Structure

```
app/
├── blog/
│ ├── posts/*.mdx # Blog posts (frontmatter: title, publishedAt, summary, image?)
│ ├── [slug]/page.tsx # Individual post pages
│ ├── page.tsx # Blog listing
│ └── utils.ts # MDX parsing utilities
├── components/ # React components
├── api/ # API routes (og image generation)
├── fonts/ # Custom fonts (Geist, Commit Mono)
└── layout.tsx # Root layout with metadata
```

### Key Conventions

- **Blog Posts**: Create `.mdx` files in `app/blog/posts/` with required frontmatter
- **Styling**: Use Tailwind utilities; dark mode via `dark:` prefix
- **Components**: Server Components by default; use `'use client'` when needed
- **Fonts**: Use `fontSans` and `fontMono` from `app/fonts/index.ts`

### MDX Components

Custom MDX components defined in `app/components/mdx.tsx`:

- Automatic external link handling
- Code blocks with `<pre>` styling
- Custom table formatting

### Theme System

- Managed by ThemeProvider using next-themes
- Three modes: light, dark, system
- Cookies used for persistence to prevent flash

## Workflows

### Sprint Planning

Run `bun run sprint:sync` to synchronize docs/SPRINT.md with latest completed tasks and backlog priorities.
</result>

import './global.css';
import type { Metadata } from 'next';
import { fontSans, fontMono } from './fonts';
import { ThemeProvider } from './components/theme-provider';
import { Footer } from './components/footer';
import { Navbar } from './components/nav';
import { Analytics } from '@vercel/analytics/react';
import { AnalyticsProvider } from './components/analytics-provider';
import { SearchVisibilityMonitor } from './components/search-visibility-monitor';

export const metadata: Metadata = {
  metadataBase: new URL('https://dfotesco.com'),
  title: {
    default: 'Diego Fotesch-Orozco | Software Engineer',
    template: '%s | Diego Fotesch-Orozco',
  },
  description:
    'Personal portfolio and blog of Diego Fotesch-Orozco, a software engineer specializing in web development, React, and modern JavaScript.',

    locale: 'en_US',
    type: 'website',
  },

    card: 'summary_large_image',
    title: 'Diego Fotesch-Orozco | Software Engineer',
    description:
      'Personal portfolio and blog of Diego Fotesch-Orozco, a software engineer.',
    creator: '@dfotesco',

  robots: {
    index: true,
    follow: true,
    googleBot: {
      index: true,
      follow: true,
      'max-video-preview': -1,
      'max-image-preview': 'large',
      'max-snippet': -1,
    },
  },
  verification: {
    google: 'your-google-verification-code',
  },
};

export default function RootLayout({
  children,
}: Readonly<{
  children: React.ReactNode;
}>) {
  return (
    <html
      lang="en"
      className={`${fontSans.variable} ${fontMono.variable}`}
      suppressHydrationWarning
    >
      <body className="antialiased">
        <ThemeProvider>
          <AnalyticsProvider>
            <main className="min-w-0 mx-auto mt-6 max-w-2xl px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
              <Navbar />
              {children}
              <Footer />
            </main>
            <SearchVisibilityMonitor />
          </AnalyticsProvider>
        </ThemeProvider>
        <Analytics />
      </body>
    </html>
  );
}

Now I have a good understanding of the codebase. Let me summarize what I've learned:

---

## Warmup Complete - Codebase Overview

This is a **Next.js 15 portfolio site** for Diego Fotesch-Orozco with the following characteristics:

### Tech Stack
- **Next.js 15** with App Router and Turbopack
- **React 19**
- **TypeScript**
- **Tailwind CSS 4.x**
- **MDX** for blog posts (using `@mdx-js/mdx` and `next-mdx-remote`)
- **Bun** as the package manager
- **Radix UI** for accessible components
- **next-themes** for dark/light mode
- **Vercel Analytics** for tracking

### Project Structure
```
app/
├── blog/           # Blog system with MDX posts
├── components/     # Shared React components
├── api/            # API routes (OG image generation, blog images)
├── fonts/          # Custom fonts (Geist, Commit Mono)
└── layout.tsx      # Root layout with metadata

docs/               # Project documentation
├── SPRINT.md       # Current sprint status
├── BACKLOG.md      # Feature backlog
├── ARCHITECTURE.md # System architecture
└── ...
```

### Current Sprint Focus (December 2024)
- CLI Guide blog post enhancements
- Projects section implementation
- Contact form with validation

### Key Patterns
- Server Components by default, `'use client'` when needed
- Blog posts in `app/blog/posts/*.mdx` with frontmatter
- Theme system with cookie persistence
- Custom MDX components in `app/components/mdx.tsx`

### Critical Files for Implementation
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/app/layout.tsx` - Root layout with providers and metadata
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/app/blog/utils.ts` - MDX parsing utilities
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/app/components/mdx.tsx` - Custom MDX component definitions
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/docs/SPRINT.md` - Current development priorities
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/CLAUDE.md` - Project conventions and commands
